title: SET_CUTSCENE_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_FROM_PED
content:
0x2A56C06EBEF2B0D90x1E7DA95E// SetCutscenePedComponentVariationFromPed
void SET_CUTSCENE_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_FROM_PED(char* cutsceneEntName, Ped ped, Hash modelHash);Parameters:cutsceneEntName: Cutscene file cHandle, i.e Michael, Lamar, Franklin, MP_1-MP_4ped: Ped to copy components frommodelHash: Not strictly neccasary, can be 0Sets the components for a cutscene ped, this will take precendence over the cutscene's component overrides. This does not require the entity be registered.See REGISTER_ENTITY_FOR_CUTSCENE for an example.
codeBlocks:
// SetCutscenePedComponentVariationFromPed
void SET_CUTSCENE_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_FROM_PED(char* cutsceneEntName, Ped ped, Hash modelHash);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_CUTSCENE_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_FROM_PED
SetCutscenePedComponentVariationFromPed('', ped, GetHashKey('prop'))
